DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: The Drivers module has inferred that the current function is a DRIVER_INITIALIZE function: This is informational only. No problem has been detected.

The 'DriverName' member of _DRIVER_OBJECT should not be accessed by a driver: Access to this member may be permitted for certain classes of drivers. See the documentation for this warning for more information.
The function being assigned or passed should be a DRIVER_UNLOAD function: Add the declaration 'DRIVER_UNLOAD DriverUnload;' before the current first declaration of DriverUnload.
